#summary Buzz PHP Client samples
#sidebar TableOfContents

There are a number of samples included in the Buzz PHP Client library that demonstrate the basic functions, as well as doing high-fidelity rendering of buzz posts, you can find these in the buzz-php-client/examples directory. 

You can also view a live version of these samples at [http://www.buzz-demos.com buzz-demos.com]

[http://code.google.com/p/google-api-php-client/source/browse/#svn/trunk/examples Examples source]
